title: Use a preliminary strategy
text: As there is a greatest common factor(3), factor it out. The expression should look like this: $$3\left(r^2-3r+2\right)$$.
speech: As there is a greatest common factor(3), factor it out. The expression should look like this:  3 times parentheses, r squared minus 3 r plus 2  .
pacedSpeech: As there is a greatest common factor(3), factor it out. The expression should look like this:   3 times , r squared minus 3 r plus 2

title: Identify
text: Inside the parentheses, is it a binomial, trinomial, or are there more than three terms? Since it is a trinomial with a coefficient of $$1$$, undo FOIL.
speech: Inside the parentheses, is it a binomial, trinomial, or are there more than three terms? Since it is a trinomial with a coefficient of  1 , undo FOIL.
pacedSpeech: Inside the parentheses, is it a binomial, trinomial, or are there more than three terms? Since it is a trinomial with a coefficient of   1

title: Use factors
text: Use the factors of $$2$$ to finish FOIL.
speech: Use the factors of  2  to finish FOIL.

title: Answer
speech: The answer is  3 times, parentheses r minus 1,  times, parentheses r minus 2,  .
pacedSpeech: The answer is   3 times,  r minus 1,  times,  r minus 2,
